121.content:
Agumon sighed as he sat down on the couch, watching television while his tamer, Taichi was at a soccer game. As Agumon flipped through the channels he found himself slowly getting more and more bored, eventually falling asleep on the couch, drooling and snoring. A couple hours later Agumon awakens again with a loud gurgle coming from his belly. He knew he was hungry but he had no idea how to get anything to eat and what to eat. He sighed as he started to think about his options. He could raid the fridge and pig out on what he could find, or he could go out and find living prey the only thing was he couldnt make up his mind.


After about fifteen minutes of thought Agumon...

122.content:
Gabumon and Matt were hanging around inside thier apartment groaning out of boredom and just watched TV most of the day. Matt's father had gone out on a business trip and Matt was left to watch the house so they were pretty much stuck at home. Gabumon would occasionally sigh as he watched television while Matt would be calling a few of his friends. Fifteen minutes on the phone Matt finally hung up the phone and hopped up. "Would you like some lunch Gabumon?"

Before Gabumon could reply, his stomach growled answering Matt's question first. "What would you like Gabumon?"

Gabumon started thinking and smiled. "I dont know...maybe hotdogs?"

Matt nodded as he walked into the kitchen and pulled out a few hotdogs. "I'll heat these up for a bit."

Gabumon nodded as he rubbed his stomach, he didnt really feel like waiting but he also didnt want to be rude to his friend. Gabumon finally hopped off of the couch and...

123.content:
Guilmon was digging around in his hideout/home, digging up some bread that he had buried awhile back since Takato would not be there to visit him till later that afternoon after school. Guilmon finally had his bread which he started munching on happily until a minute later he had finished his last loaf but his stomach was still growling loudly for food. He didnt know what to do now as his ears dropped.

"Takatomon I hope you come back soon..." Guilmon muttered to himself as he layed there, hoping to be fed soon.

Guilmon waited in this position for nearly three hours as the growling in his gut grew louder. He whimpered but as he heard a sound outside of the cage he turned his head to see what or who it was.

Flamedramon grunted as he took down another contrel spire which freed all the digimon around the area.

The first one was Gatomon, No matter what he did she would ethier take little interist or no interist at all the only thing she thought about was Patamon.

The second person was his own partner Davis always thinking up ways to get Kari to notice him sometimes it would get so bad that would complete forget about him and right now was one of those moments.

Earlier Davis promised Flamedramon that he was going to feed him but forgot when Kari walked in, because of that Flamedramon's stomach had been running on empty the whole day.

This wasn't the first time it happen there were many other events to but now today was the last straw.

125111.content:
Flamedramon and his stomach growled.
He was mad, and he was hungry, and Davis was going to keep his promise to feed his Digimon one way or another!
The Armored Digimon of Courage grabbed hold of his human and dragged him off before he started to rip the human's clothes off.
As hungry as he was, he didn't want to get those clothes caught in his throat, and they would dry and tasteless anyway.
Davis was understandably shocked.
"Flamedramon! Wait, what are you doing?" He struggled in his Digimon's grasp, and soon lost his jacket and shirt.
He got a hungry smirk in response. "What do you think? You said you'd feed me, and I'm holding you to that. Your clothes would get in the way."
One look at the hungry predator's eyes, and he knew his partner was telling the truth.
The Digimon's stomach growled louder, and he impatiently tore off Davis' pants as well.
Desperate, the human took advantage of the little time he had to try and bargain his way out of this.
"Wait! Wait! I can still feed you! You don't have to eat me! Please, Flamedramon!" He pleaded desperately.
Davis was down to just his underwear as Flamedramon finished pulling off the struggling human's shoes and socks.
He paused to consider.
Eat his human and teach him a lesson?
Or spare his friend and give him another chance?
